official-title.#text:
To amend section 505 of the Federal Food, Drug, and
		  Cosmetic Act to provide incentives for the development of new combination
		  drugs.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Combination Drug Development Incentive
			 Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Applicability to
			 combination drugs submitted under a new drug application

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Clause (ii) of section 505(c)(3)(E) of the Federal Food,
			 Drug, and Cosmetic Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:505/ss:c/p:3/sp:E/cl:ii

quote.#text:
(ii) If an application submitted under subsection (b) for a drug, no
			 active ingredient (including any ester or salt of the active ingredient) of
			 which has been approved in any other application under subsection (b),

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: for a drug, and described in
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:505/ss:b
Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:505/ss:c/p:3/sp:E/cl:ii/scl:II
Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:505/ss:c/p:3/sp:E/cl:ii/scl:III

text.#text: by striking

by adding at the
			 end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:505/ss:b

text.#text:
An application is described in this
				subclause if no active ingredient (including any ester or salt of the active
				ingredient) of the drug for which the application has been submitted has been
				approved in any other application under

An application is described in this
				subclause if—

the application contains reports
				of new clinical investigations (other than bioavailability studies) essential
				to the approval of the application and conducted or sponsored by the
				applicant;

the application is for a drug
				which contains a combination of active ingredients; and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:505/ss:b

text.#text:
no such combination of active
				ingredients has been approved in any other application under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Subclause
			 (I) of section 505(c)(3)(E)(ii) of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:505/ss:c/p:3/sp:E/cl:ii/scl:I
Combination Drug Development Incentive Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a/p:1

quote.#text:
is approved
			 after the date of the enactment of this clause
